short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays bookmarks related to current Salesforce org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a Salesforce developer?
How many Salesforce orgs do you work with?

Save bookmarks for any record or page in Salesforce.

Whenever you log in to this org, SF Org Bookmarks will automatically identify the current org and display the right bookmarks.
You don't get confused with other org's bookmarks and can reach any page you would like faster.

The bookmarks are stored in your local device (We do not have any access to it).

New features and updates:
1.3.0: 
Transfer all URLs of one org to a new SF instance (e.g. eu5 -> na6);
Detect Org id in Lightning (beta)
1.3.3:
Fix title capture in Lightning
1.4.0:
View and manage orgs list
Copy URL to clipboard
1.4.1:
Improve automatic name of new bookmark
1.4.2:
Support new salesforce-setup.com domain; Quota warning
